description: Maps data sources to Google Slides placeholders. Used by n8n episode-setup workflow to populate both slide content AND speaker notes (which serve as the host script).
notes: Placeholders appear in both onScreen elements and speakerNotes. The Slides API replaceAllText operation handles both.

{{TALKING_POINTS}}.format: Convert newlines to bullet points (for slide body)

{{TALKING_POINTS_BRIEF}}.format: First 3 points only, shortened to 1 line each

{{TALKING_POINTS_EXPANDED}}.format: Each point expanded to 2-3 sentences with discussion prompts (for speaker notes)

{{GUEST_HEADSHOT}}.notes: Inserted via Slides API replaceAllShapesWithImage request

{{SPONSOR_FRESH_POST}}.source: n8n workflow: fetch sponsor's latest social post
{{SPONSOR_FRESH_POST}}.notes: Pulled weekly from sponsor's Instagram/social feed. Makes sponsor mentions feel organic — Gabe talks about what the sponsor is actually doing right now rather than reading a static ad.

{{SPONSOR2}}.source: Episode Calendar or Affiliate Partners (second sponsor)

{{SPONSOR2_FRESH_POST}}.source: n8n workflow: fetch second sponsor's latest social post

{{INDUSTRY_NEWS}}.format: 3-5 bullet points of tattoo industry news for the week

{{TECH_FEATURE}}.notes: TattooNOW tool/feature being demonstrated in Tech Corner

{{EVENT_DETAILS}}.notes: I&P Venice, Paradise Gathering, partner convention details

{{AFFILIATE_LINKS}}.notes: Generated by link-generator.js — all active partners' Cross-Promo Links

speakerNotesStrategy.description: Speaker notes are populated per-slide with the host's script/bullet points. They contain the same placeholders as the slides, plus expanded versions for the presenter to reference.
speakerNotesStrategy.population: The n8n episode-setup workflow replaces placeholders in BOTH slide content and speaker notes in a single batchUpdate call to the Slides API.
speakerNotesStrategy.aiExpansion: For deeper talking points, the Claude API expands brief bullet points into conversational prompts and transition language, populated into the speaker notes.
